Suggestion 1: If I give treatment for my mom whether she doesnt get pain until her last day in earth or will get pain in last stages even if she gets treatment. or Suggestion 2: If I hide that she is having cancer and fine with everything and having only normal back pain and getting some pain killer tablet for her. (whether the normal pain killer is enough to mask her back pain, please suggest me I am the only son to my mom to take care) Thanks, Jayakumar Natarajan
